GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Provides an array of all the comments for a specific article(article_id)

Post /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Allows client to post comments provided they have a verified username and a body
